articles.author: Ivana Kottasova, Jessie Yeung
articles.title: Shootings are ‘spreading like a disease in Europe,’ says survivor of deadly Prague attack - CNN
articles.description: Jakob Weizman, a student at Charles University in the Czech Republic and a former US resident, says shootings “spreading like a disease to Europe as well.”
articles.content:
Jakob Weizman, a Danish student at the Charles University in Prague, was taking an exam on Thursday when he started hearing gunshots and screams.
His first instinct was shock, he said he never thoug… [+4239 chars]
